mapper.insert: insert into storeMenu (num, storeNum, storeName, menuImage, menuName, content, price, best, category) values(storeMenu_seq.nextval, #{storeNum},#{storeName}, #{menuImage}, #{menuName}, #{content}, #{price}, 'no', #{category})
mapper.select: select storeMenu.num as num, storeMenu.storeName as storeName, menuImage, menuName, content, price, best, storeMenu.category as category from storeMenu inner join store on store.num=storeMenu.storeNum where store.owner=#{owner} and store.num=#{num}

select nvl(max(rnum),0) from (select result1.*, rownum as rnum from (select * from storeMenu inner join store on store.storeName=storeMenu.storeName where best='yes' and store.num=#{num} and store.storeName=#{storeName} and store.owner=#{owner}) result1)
